Article.ArticleTitle: Essential Oils in Foods: From Ancient Times to the 21st Century.

AbstractText: Medicinal plants and culinary herbs have been used since ancient times. Essential oils (EO) are a mixture of numerous compounds, mainly terpenes, alcohols, acids, esters, epoxides, aldehydes, ketones,aminesandsulﬁdes,thatareprobablyproducedbyplantsasaresponsetostress[1].[...].
